item.title: Automate Oracle JRE 8 STIG Compliance with Powershell Script
item.dc:creator: SimeonOnSecurity
item.category: "Oracle JRE 8 STIG" , "JAVA STIG" , "JRE" , "JRE8" , "JRE STIG" , "Compliance" , "Automation" , "Powershell" , "Script" , "JAVA Configuration" , "Java Documentation" , "Group Policy" , "IT Security" , "System Administration" , "Configuration Management" , "Windows" , "Cybersecurity" , "STIG Compliance" , "Information Technology" , "Software Configuration"
item.description: Simplify the process of configuring Oracle JRE 8 STIG compliance with an automated Powershell script, eliminating the need for manual research and configuration.
